name: Harpoon
description: Harpoon is a rocket launcher that has notable accuracy.
notes:
Harpoons are actually rare weapons, as the damage boost from being 1-shot tends to promote them to the higher priority Destructor . Consequentially, Harpoons can't have exceptional damage, nor can they have the RWL body.
Consequentially, Harpoons can't have exceptional damage, nor can they have the RWL body.
The Harpoon effect comes from the title Title_Accuracy1_Harpoon . It is bestowed on Rocket Launchers that have a single rocket clip, as well as high accuracy. It will further improve the weapon's accuracy, as well as increase its bullet velocity. For an explanation on how to interpret the information on the following table, please see the stat modifiers page.
